About DataStax:
DataStax is the company behind the massively scalable, highly available, cloud-native NoSQL data platform built on Apache Cassandra™. DataStax gives developers and enterprises the freedom to run data in any cloud, Kubernetes, hybrid or bare metal at global scale with zero downtime and zero lock-in. More than 450 of the world’s leading enterprises including Capital One, Cisco, Comcast, Delta Airlines, Macy’s, McDonald’s, Safeway, Sony, and Walmart use DataStax to build transformational data architectures for real-world outcomes. For more, visit DataStax.com and @DataStax.

About DataStax Developer:
On the DataStax Developers YouTube channel, you can find tutorials, workshops and much more to help you learn and stay updated with the latest information on Apache Cassandra©.  Visit https://datastax.com/dev for more free learning resources.

settings you will see the ip access list and one of the first things you can do is restrict public access you'll see this message here notifying you that you are restricting all public access to your list in astra in order to do that you're going to need the application token from astra and pass it in a header in order to access the api additionally you are going to need to get a very specific url based on your request this request is get access list for a database and you can see the url here we can make these requests in postman postman is a great service that helps manage our requests as you send description now equals success let's check it in the ui description is success now you can see we have a variety of other requests that we can make and you can learn more about those in the documentation
